{| class="wikitable" !'''''[[Gluster_File_System_Documentation | Home!!]]''''' |} = HowTo = === From GlusterDocumentation === This page contains guides for doing stuff with GlusterFS. ==== Finished Articles ==== * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/GlusterOnZFS GlusterFS On ZFS] * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/CTDB CTDB HOWTO] * [http://download.gluster.org/pub/gluster/glusterfs/doc/HA%20and%20Load%20Balancing%20for%20NFS%20and%20SMB.html HA and Load Balancing with NFS and SMB] * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/CompilingRPMS Creating Gluster RPMS] - How to compile GlusterFS RPMs from git source, for RHEL/CentOS 6.4 and Fedora 16-18 * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/GlusterFS_Keystone_Quickstart GlusterFS Keystone Quickstart] * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/GlusterFS_Cinder GlusterFS Cinder] - Setup instructions for using GlusterFS with OpenStack Grizzly's block service (Cinder) * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/GlusterFS_iSCSI GlusterFS iSCSI] - Setup instructions for using GlusterFS as a block storage system with an iSCSI interface * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Adding_space_in_EC2_with_EBS Adding space in EC2 with EBS] - A simple procedure to expand the size of your EBS-backed GlusterFS volume. ===== Tips and Tricks ===== * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Network_Bonding Network Configuration Techniques] * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/HowTos:Brick_naming_conventions Brick naming conventions] * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Using_Gluster_with_OSX Using Gluster with OSX] - Tips for connecting to GlusterFS volumes with OSX * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Linux_Kernel_Tuning Linux Kernel Tuning] - Need to get in the nitty gritty for kernel tuning parameters? This is the article for you * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Glusterfs-filter Glusterfs-filter] - Modyfing .vol files directly with a filter. * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Using_the_Gluster_Test_Framework Using the Gluster Test Framework] - How to get started with the GlusterFS Test Framework * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Building_QEMU_with_gfapi_for_Debian_based_systems Building QEMU with gfapi for Debian based systems] * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Performance_Testing Performance Testing] - DRAFT - how to test Gluster performance with typical multi-client, multi-stream workloads. ===== Troubleshooting ===== * [http://joejulian.name/blog/glusterfs-path-or-a-prefix-of-it-is-already-part-of-a-volume/ Disk already used in a volume] * [https://gist.github.com/4392640 Resolve GFID to filename] * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Resolving_Peer_Rejected Resolving Peer Rejected] * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Gluster_3.4:_Brick_Restoration_-_Replace_Crashed_Server Gluster 3.4: Brick Restoration - Replace Crashed Server] ==== Articles that need to be written ==== ===== Troubleshooting ===== * UUID's and cloning Gluster instances * Verifying cluster integrity ===== Configuration ===== remaining topics: * using cgroups to manage Gluster behaviour under different workloads * CTDB configuration for failover of non-native protocols (SMB/NFS) * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php?title=DebianPackagePatching&action=edit&redlink=1 Patching Debian/Ubuntu Packages] ===== Tips and Tricks ===== * Running commands on multiple servers * Which filesystem should I format the Gluster bricks with? - this is easy: XFS. Ext4 considered harmful. ===== Analytics ===== * [http://www.gluster.org/community/documentation/index.php/Hadoop Running GlusterFS on top of Hadoop]
